com.amplifyframework.api.aws

Class ApiGraphQLRequestOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.amplifyframework.api.aws.ApiGraphQLRequestOptions
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GraphQLRequestOptions

    public final class ApiGraphQLRequestOptions
extends java.lang.Object
implements GraphQLRequestOptions
    Defines options for building a GraphQLRequest when using the API category directly (DataStore is disabled).
